alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Bradford, north central Alachua, southern Baker, Union, central Columbia and east central Suwannee Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Columbia, or 7 miles south of Lake City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Lake Butler, Raiford, Worthington Spring, Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia, Glen St. Mary, Worthington Springs, Palestine Community and Groves. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua
